checkerList.name: GPL 2.0+
checkerList.description: Opensource//Inserting Patent or Proprietary code is prohibited//Should be published//Check detail description

properties.ShortDescription: Opensource//Inserting Patent or Proprietary code is prohibited//Should be published//Check detail description
properties.EnglishDescription:
This looks GPL licensed software. If this software is used(embedded) in product, following obiligation should be complied.
[Scope of source code disclosure]
1) Disclose the original, modified and added GPL code.
2) Disclose all code linking with GPL components. 
   If linked software is implemented by independent module with GPL component(in example, implemented with indepedent thread like fork(),exec() by plug-in module), only modified GPL modules can be disclosed to public. 
3) Disclose the code that forms a single executable module(*.exe) with the GPL code.
4) Disclose the configuration files for building GPL components.

checkerList.name: GPL
checkerList.description:
GPL Kernel module is detected, MODULE_LICENSE("GPL").
As to VD opensource guideline, kernel module file should be followed GPL license compliance.

properties.ShortDescription:

properties.EnglishDescription:
This looks GPL licensed software. If this software is used(embedded) in product, following obiligation should be complied.
[Scope of source code disclosure]
1) Disclose the original, modified and added GPL code.
2) Disclose all code linking with GPL components. 
   If linked software is implemented by independent module with GPL component(in example, implemented with indepedent thread like fork(),exec() by plug-in module), only modified GPL modules can be disclosed to public. 
3) Disclose the code that forms a single executable module(*.exe) with the GPL code.
4) Disclose the configuration files for building GPL components.

checkerList.name: LGPL 2.0/2.1
checkerList.description: Opensource//Inserting Patent or Proprietary code is prohibited//Should be published//Check detail description

properties.ShortDescription: Opensource//Inserting Patent or Proprietary code is prohibited//Should be published//Check detail description
properties.EnglishDescription:
This looks LGPL licensed software. If this software is used(embedded) in product, following obiligation should be complied.
[Scope of source code disclosure]
1) Disclose the original LGPL source code.
2) Disclose the modified and added LGPL source code (disclosed at the level of modules or libraries).
3) Provide the object code of the application program linked statically to the LGPL (c.f., not applicable to applications linked dynamically)
4) Provide all scripts controlling compilation and installation of the LGPL library.
